AboutMeSection.Title: About Me
AboutMeSection.Text1: Hello! I'm Juanjo, a full-stack web developer. I really like creating websites and working on innovative projects. Having experience in both front-end and back-end development, I specialize in front-end, where React is my framework of choice.
AboutMeSection.Text2: I consider myself quite versatile and feel comfortable working with various programming languages. I'm always open to learning new ones as necessary to stay ahead with the new technologies.
